nodes.title: Revert the renaming of UniRetry as it introduced an API breaking change
Cosmetic - Avoid code duplications especially in Tuples
Add the ability to configure the default executor
Check that it is possible to provide generic type hints
Add a way to combine Uni and discard the emitted items
Document how async action should be represented and Uni<Void>
Add some test verifying that emitter can have multiple subscribers
onTermination must be called only once
Document the difference between concatenate() and merge()
add documentation about emitter and mention hot stream creation
WIP - use a more reliable action to download the JDKs
Add support for hot streams using a BroadcastProcessor
Fix the missing generic parameter in UniAndGroupIterable.
Explain the difference between emitOn and subscribeOn
Implement Multi and Uni retry backOff and retry until
Add support for retry back-off in Multi
Add requested and isCancelled method to the MultiEmitter.
Use a static for an Uni with a null item
Provide easier way to create Uni<Void>
When a group subscriber cancels, requesting must be re-attempted.
Uni creation in AbstractUni must call the onUniCreation hook
Add build step to check the behavior on OpenJ9 (Java 11)
Provide an implementation of Multi consuming a java.util.Stream in a lazy fashion
Multi.flatMap should cancel the inners when the upstream fires a failure
Implementation of the new release process
Add a variant of Uni.createFrom().deferred allowing passing a shared state
Explain and improve how to use "paginated" API
Add repeat operator and explain how to use poll-able sources
Fix javadoc incorrect method in javadoc
Add support for MP context propagation
Misc. typo and grammar fixes in FAQ
Seems like it should be 0..* not 0..n
Fix #28 - It should not be possible to not set the timeout
Update to latest parent with format changes
Switch from SPI to converter API
Allow integration point for MP-CP to wrap CFs we create
Provide a way to subscribe to a multi as an iterable or as a stream
add support for broadcast in multi
Add more tests to handle edges cases  + Fix racy tests
proof of concept for renaming proposal (#273)
Fix a race condition and error propagation in UniSerializedSubscriber
Migrate the context-propagation module to junit 5
Add more tests to the MultiBufferOp and MultiWindowOp
Infrastructure hook to check the caller thread on blocking operations
Remove non executed code and continue drop exception integration
Use Moditect to generate package-info for the main Mutiny module
Remove Predicates class and useless check in ParameterValidation
Fix RX Maybe converters when handling cancellation
Add more tests for some Multi operators
Fix potential NPE in the UniSerializedSubscriber on cancellation
Enforce Reactive Streams protocol in subscribers and processors
Check for null subscriber in Context Propagation Multi interceptor
Create onCancellation() groups for Uni and Multi
Automatic license headers verification and application
Add the Uni.chain and Uni.then shortcuts
Avoid double interception on Multi creation when using groups
Add invoke and invokeUni shortcut on Uni and Multi
Add the onSubscribe group to both Uni and Multi
Move onTermination to its own group
Use suppressed exception instead of explicit list in CompositeException
Improvement around Uni creation and subscription
Uni.onFailure().invoke should enforce the failure predicate
Reduce duplication between the 2 MultiRepeat operators
Grouping items into list from empty stream should produce an empty list
Avoid leaking CompletionException coming from CompletionStage
Add expireAt/expireIn to back off retry
Fix Uni.or - The list didn't include the upstream Uni.
Enable the Reactive Streams Operators TCK
Support a filter operation on Multi
Handle late registration of onTermination callback
Add helpers.{spies,test} and subscription packages in the module-info.java
Rename collectItems() and groupItems() into collect() and group()
Implement the Multi select and skip groups
Upgrade the website version on release
Write a getting started guide about events, invoke and call
Clarify and verify the semantic of the combination, merge and concatenation of none or one upstream.
Very minor typo in getting started guide
Mention Red Hat sponsoring and privacy policy
Fix potential deadlock in the SwitchableSubscriptionSubscriber
Do not trigger onCancellation() when the stream has already completed
Optimize MultiFilterOp on the hot path
Allow Multi creation from publishers that are assumed to be TCK-compliant
HalfSerializer onNext(): simplify the entry condition
SafeSubscriber: move the upstream subscription to a regular field
Clarify what happens when the supplier is null
Initial configuration of revapi to detect API incompatibility.
Fix mistake in JavaDocs of ExecutorConfiguration
Move test subscribers to the public API
Fix potential invalid request (0) in the SkipOperator
Fix Uni memoization infinite drain loop bug
Avoid requesting individual items if the first request in requesting Long.MAX
Pluggable ThreadContext from the context propagation interceptors
Caching the ThreadContext breaks in multi-deployment environments
Homogenise method names in the AssertSubscriber and the UniAssertSubscriber
Fix a race condition between onSubscribe / cancel / on{Item,Failure}
Add tests verifying the correctness of inner merge and concat when the emission are done on different threads
Missing upstream cancellation on back pressure failure
Mark spies as an experimental API
Synchronize the ConnectableProcessor onComplete and onError to avoid race condition on state
Do not create Exception on the hot path as stack trace collection is very expensive
Make item collection optional in MultiOnItemSpy
[DO NOT MERGE] - Still broken ... attempt to fix codecov
UniRetry and MultiRetry now tests the predicate from onFailure()
Revert a change made in 0.8.0 around the onOverflow().drop() operator
Add tests around failure propagation and remove unless code
CI update - Use Ubuntu 20.04 and use Zulu build for Java 15
A couple of additional tests and fixes
Add codecov actions to the workflows
Refactor to invoke and call methods instead of invoke / invokeUni
Release the downstream subscriber upon cancellation.
Change the default infrastructure pool to be a cached thread pool instead of the fork/join
Update MicroProfile Reactive Streams Operators to version 2.0
New approach for the awaitItems method in the AssertSubscriber
Multiple upstream requests in the multi.collect().last() operator
Fix duplicate items issue when create a multi from a collection
Fix race condition when waiting for items in the MultiGroupTest
#516 Let MultiMerge.streams accept Iterable<? extends Publisher<T>>
Fix the post release scripts version extraction from tag
Delay the start of the "ticks" after the first request.
Fix a request / consume race when using .request(x).awaitNextItems(x)
Configure CI to run the build with Java 15 and 16 (EA).
Allow configuring a delay between two repetitions
Rename occurrences of the master branch to main
Update MicroProfile Reactive Streams Operators to 2.0-RC1
Fix a bug when Uni from JDK Future get cancelled
Update MicroProfile Reactive Streams Operators to 1.1-RC1
Uni signals tracking and ordering assertion in UniAssertSubscriber
Fix memoize missing late subscriber subscription
Explicitly cancel the scheduled future upon user's cancellation
Add the ability to create a Uni from a Future or a Supplier of Future
New script that waits until artifacts lands on a maven repo
Fix repetition when the first emitted item is `null`
Cleanup the operator classes package layout
Fix Uni subscription when interceptors are present
remove subscribeOn and configure revapi properly
Provide Uni implementation to avoid abusing from the emitter
Fix off-by-one retry count when using exponential backoff
Allow disabling all Callback decorators via environment properties
Use atomic field updaters in selected Uni places
Avoid allocating instances of AtomicReference in Uni
Switch to temurin (the new name of adopt)
Configure CI to test with Java 8, 11, 16, and 17-EA
Add UniOnPredicate and refactor UniOnNull and UniOnNotNull to use it
Use the thread-local ThreadContext in order to be able to define which contexts get propagated
Move dokka plugin to its own profile to be able to skip it
Migrate to smallrye-build-parent and isolate BOM
Fix NPE happening after cancellation in MultiSelectFirstOp
Vert.x bindings documentation website and version update
Math operators with concurrent data structures
Mark combinedWith as an experimental API
Enforce API contract on UniCombine emptiness
Make sure terminal event is checked before items in math tests
Sonar Quality Gate fixes in math
Deprecate onSubscribe() in favor or onSubscription()
Convenience combinedWith method with a class cast
Use the Google Mirror as an additional repository in all CI tasks
